#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define MAXN 10000005
#define PB push_back
#define ll long long
#define NUM 664579
#define MOD 10007
using namespace std;

int flag[MAXN] = {0};
ll primes[664585];
void sieve()
{
    primes[0] = 2;
    //for(int i=0;i<MAXN;i++)smallest[i] = i;

    for(int i=3;i<=3162;i+=2)
    {
        if(flag[i]==0)
        {
            //primes.PB(i);
            for(int j=i*i;j<=MAXN;j+=i)
            {
                flag[j]= 1;
                //smallest[j] = min((ll)i,smallest[j]);
            }
        }
    }
    int j = 1;
    for(int i=3;i<MAXN;i+=2)
    {
        if(flag[i] == 0)
        {
            primes[j++] = i;
        }
    }
    //for(int i=0;i<100;i++)cout<<primes[i]<<" ";cout<<endl;
    //cout<<j<<endl;

}
ll ipow(ll a,ll b,ll c)
{
    ll ans = 1;
    while(b)
    {
        if(b&1)ans = (ans*a)%c;
        a = (a*a)%c;
        b>>=1;
    }
    return ans;
}
int main()
{
    sieve();
    ll n;
    while(scanf("%lld",&n)!=EOF)
    {
        if(n==1)
        {
            printf("0\n");
            continue;
        }
        ll temp = lower_bound(primes,primes+NUM,n)-primes;
        if(primes[temp]==n)temp++;
        temp--;
        temp = ipow(2,temp,MOD);
        printf("%lld\n",temp);
    }
}
